CustomField.description: Use in conjunction with "Roll Up To Ultimate Parent" to specify the hierarchical/self-referential lookup field on the Lookup Object that hold the values for the ultimate parent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use in conjunction with "Roll Up To Ultimate Parent" to specify the hierarchical/self-referential lookup field on the Lookup Object that hold the values for the ultimate parent.
CustomField.label: Ultimate Parent Lookup
